name: The Case of the Counterfit
description:
A short point & click game where you play as a hardboiled noir detective in a colorful, cutesy alien world! When an imposter detective runs amok threatening your reputation, it's up to you to unravel the truth. Interrogate NPCs and investigate leads to catch the culprit!

Aidan Adams: Narrative, Art, Backup Programmer

Lee Coronilia: Art

Kirsten Lindblad: Programming

Angela Yim: Narrative & Art

With music/sound from Evan Oliveras
